title: How many children were killed during building Gaza tunnels? - Quora

response.answer_text: It would be impossible to get an exact answer. The Hamas has no interest in publishing such information, or in allowing it to be published. Even so, it is known that the number is high. This report from 2012 cites a Hamas authority: During a police patrol that the author was permitted to accompany in December 2011, nothing was done to impede the use of children in the tunnels, where, much as in Victorian coal mines, they are prized for their nimble bodies. At least 160 children have been killed in the tunnels, as of 2012, according to Hamas officials. Gaza's Tunnel Phenomenon: The Unintended Dynamics of Israel's Siege Of course, as always the case with reports that are inconvenient to the Hamas, a “correction” was issued, saying this was the **total** number of all people killed. This was as 2012. You can be sure that the deaths have continued… Publications and media are under almost constant surveillance, regarding what they publish, and always agree to requests to retract or withdraw when Hamas demands it. “It would be a real shame if something “happened” to your journalists…”

According to Hamas in a Jerusalem Post article , there are 160 children who have died in the tunnels, but its not clear if they died while digging in the tunnels , or their deaths were due to a tunnel collapse or cave-in while crossing the tunnel to Egypt (sometimes accompanying family members for medical care or education in Egypt) , or as a result of air strikes targeting the tunnels while people and children were crossing.

The official figures, as released by the terrorists who build the tunnels are 160. I think one also has to factor in the pain, suffering, starvation, poor education etc. of the Gaza children who are denied basic rights because money donated to Gaza for humane reasons, is diverted for military and terrorist use.
In 2014 the number used was 160. Since then who knows how many more have died to further the terrorism of Hamas. 'At least 160 children died digging tunnels for Hamas'
Too damn many, that's how many, as anyone with an ounce of human feeling and a shred of human decency knows*. *Comment not necessarily directed at you, OP.

all of them. Check with Hamas at 1–800-killthejews for exact numbers . They’re always looking for Martyrs from someone else’s Family, so might be willing to come to your kid’s school to give a recruiting presentation.
